alert.note: Alert for Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 17 at 6:07PM CDT until April 17 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches and gusty northwest winds to 40 mph. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Southern Lake County northeast Silver Bay. In Wisconsin, mainly the northern half of Price County. * WHEN...Until 11 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
